## Useful Advising Links

Essential online resources for academic planning, degree tracking, and program exploration.

### [CUNYfirst](https://home.cunyfirst.cuny.edu/)

CUNY's student information system for course registration, grades, financial aid, and academic records.

### [Navigate](https://csi-cuny.campus.eab.com/)

Schedule appointments with advisors, access academic planning tools, and connect with campus resources.

### [DegreeWorks](https://www.csi.cuny.edu/online-resources/degreeworks)

Track your degree progress, see which requirements you've completed, and plan remaining courses for graduation.

### [Major Exploration Toolbox](https://www.csi.cuny.edu/students/academic-advisement/students/major-exploration-tools)

Explore different majors, career paths, and find resources to help you choose the right program for your goals.

### [Math Department Programs](https://csi-undergraduate.catalog.cuny.edu/departments/MATH-CSI/programs)

Browse all mathematics programs, degrees, and minors offered by the Department of Mathematics.

### [CS-MTH Double Major](https://csi-undergraduate.catalog.cuny.edu/programs/CSCMTH-BS)

Requirements and information for students pursuing a double major in Computer Science and Mathematics.

### [Faculty Resources for Advising](https://www.csi.cuny.edu/faculty-staff/facultystaff-resources)

Resources and information for faculty members who provide academic advising to students.
